original_title: Aline Barros e Cia - Tim-Tim por Tim-Tim
overview: "Tim-Tim Por Tim-Tim" is the sixth children's studio album by singer Aline Barros, being the fourth released by the label MK Music, in 2014. It had musical production and arrangements by Ruben di Souza.  The DVD version was released in October 2015.
title: Aline Barros e Cia - Tim-Tim por Tim-Tim
